content: materials - 3 skeins of purl soho s lanecardate feltro 1 75% superfine wool 25% caregora angora each skein is approximately 98 yards/100 grams approximately 250 yards required we used the color oatmeal - us 15 10 mm 24-inch circular needles 4 - a large cable stitch holder 5 or spare double pointed needle - a jumbo stitch marker 6 gauge - 10 stitches = 4 inches in stockinette stitch - 14 stitches = 4 inches in 2 x 1 rib unstretched - 16 stitches = 4 inches in 2 x 2 rib unstretched size - finished height 12 inches - finished circumference 28 inches at the bottom 24 inches at the top 1 https //www purlsoho com/lanecardate-feltro 2 https //www purlsoho com/lovebird html 3 https //www purlsoho com/franca html 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964 6 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964
